problem_text_cn: 如图,已知扇形AOB的半径为3cm,圆心角的度数为120°,若将此扇形围成一个圆锥,则围成的圆锥的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of the sector-shaped AOB is N_0, and the degree of the central angle is N_1. If the sector is enclosed into a cone, the lateral area of ​​the enclosed cone is ()
